explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning techniques to develop a credit scoring model.

explanations.classification: Credit scoring is a classification problem where customers are classified into different credit risk categories.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions the use of the Support Vector Method (SVM) as one of the machine learning models.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for Support Vector Machine, which is mentioned in the paper as the Support Vector Method.
explanations.decision tree: The paper mentions the use of Decision Tree as one of the machine learning models.
